00041 using namespace Hypertable;
00042 using namespace Config;
00043 using namespace std;

00045 namespace {
00046 
00047   struct AppPolicy : Policy {
00048     static void init_options() {
00049       cmdline_desc("Usage: rsclient [options] <host>[:<port>]\n\nOptions");
00050       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("rs-location", str(), "");
00051       cmdline_positional_desc().add("rs-location", -1);
00052     }
00053     static void init() {
00054       if (has("rs-location")) {
00055         Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(get_str("rs-location"));
00056         properties->set("rs-host", e.host);
00057         if (e.port) properties->set("rs-port", e.port);
00058       }
00059     }
00060   };
00061 
00062   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, CommandShellPolicy, HyperspaceClientPolicy,
00063           RangeServerClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00064 
00065   class NullDispatchHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00066   public:
00067     virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) { return; }
00068   };
00069 
00070 } // local namespace
00071 
00072 
00073 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00074   int error = 1;
00075 
00076   try {
00077     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00078 
00079     int timeout = get_i32("timeout");
00080     InetAddr addr(get_str("rs-host"), get_i16("rs-port"));
00081 
00082     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00083 
00084     // Create Range Server client object
00085     RangeServerClientPtr client = new RangeServerClient(comm, timeout);
00086 
00087     DispatchHandlerPtr null_handler_ptr = new NullDispatchHandler();
00088     // connect to RangeServer
00089     if ((error = comm->connect(addr, null_handler_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00090       cerr << "error: unable to connect to RangeServer "<< addr << endl;
00091       exit(1);
00092     }
00093 
00094     // Connect to Hyperspace
00095     Hyperspace::SessionPtr hyperspace =
00096         new Hyperspace::Session(comm, properties, 0);
00097 
00098     if (!hyperspace->wait_for_connection(timeout))
00099       exit(1);
00100 
00101     CommandInterpreterPtr interp =
00102         new RangeServerCommandInterpreter(comm, hyperspace, addr, client);
00103 
00104     CommandShellPtr shell = new CommandShell("rsclient", interp, properties);
00105 
00106     error = shell->run();
00107   }
00108   catch (Exception &e) {
00109     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00110     return e.code();
00111   }
00112   return error;
00113 }
